    public class TxtAreaDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

    Class created to display updated weather conditons. Class implements Interface Observer to get updated weather condtions.

    Weronika Warwas

        public TxtAreaDisplay​(javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtTemp,
                      javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtPressure,

                      javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtTemp_max,
                      javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtTemp_min,
                      javafx.scene.control.TextField txtTime,
                      javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtF)
        Class constructor specifying a place to display weather conditions
        Parameters:
        txtTemp - The text area in which the updated temperature is displayed
        txtPressure - The text area in which the updated pressure is displayed
        txtHumidity - The text area in which the updated humidity is displayed
        txtTemp_max - The text area in which the updated maximal temperature is displayed
        txtTemp_min - The text area in which the updated minimal temperature is displayed
        txtTime - The text filed in which the updated time is displayed
        txtF - The text area in which the updated temperature in fahrenheits is displayed
